name: Deadly Premonition: The Director's Cut
content:
game:
  appid: 247660
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: quartz
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: devenum
    description: Installing Devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp9
    description: Installing WMP9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 vcrun2008
    description: Installing PhysX
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2005
    description: Installing VC++ Runtime 2005
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2008
    description: Installing VC++ Runtime 2008
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
